title: Briarcliff Exposed with Lana Winters
description: A 1971 expos√© of Briarcliff Manor, sanitarium for the mentally ill in Framingham, Massachusetts. Lana Winters presents a shocking portrayal of the inhumane and often torturous conditions, including her own wrongful imprisonment.
quote: These images and sounds are far more powerful than any words that can be spoken.
alt1: Winters standing in a bleak concrete room with patients around
alt2: two male patients, one hunched on the bed, one naked facing the wall
alt3: Winters speaks with a sanitarium employee
alt4: Winters stands by an empty mattress on the floor
